name: driver-monitoring-system
description: Offline-first driver monitoring system with mobile app and web dashboard

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run web" "npm run mobile"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web-dashboard && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../web-dashboard && npm run build

author: Driver Monitoring System
